titleStmt.title: Master Clark defended: or, a vindication of two particular passages in the historical relation of the late Presbyterian General Assembly
titleStmt.author: An assured well-wisher of Mr. Clark.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to James Clark; signed at end: ... an assured well-wisher of Mr. Clark.
Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996; dated at end: At Innerweek, Dec. 11. 1691.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
